title: Learning Analytics-Based Student Engagement Monitoring Strategies for Large-Scale Health Science Classes

context.prior_knowledge: Basic health science knowledge and experience using online learning tools
context.additional_context: Language Education Course Conducted in Smartphone-Centric Limited Technology Environments, Featuring Practice-Oriented Classes Using Action Learning Research Approach

learning_goals: Learning analytics tools enable monitoring of students' real-time engagement with over 80% accuracy
Applying the action learning approach, learners can design and implement at least three personalized feedback strategies per student
Based on Learning Management System (LMS) data, learners can identify and intervene early with the bottom 20% in academic achievement

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
